webwork-tex.statement:
Find an equation for the plane \(y = 5\) in cylindrical coordinates. (Type theta for \(\theta\) in your answer.)
\par equation: \mbox{\parbox[t]{27.5ex}{\hrulefill}}
webwork-tex.solution:
\par \par {\bf Solution: }\par SOLUTION \par
The plane has equation \(r = \frac{5}{\sin\!\left(theta\right)}\).
\par
